name: Burg Wimmel
description:
A game about finding and coloring cute items. Bring back the color to the black and white Burg Wimmel, a beautiful hand-drawn castle. Here you have to find cute cats, cheeky crows, cautious rats and many other creatures and items.

Burg Wimmel Features:
- 2.5D effects
- Over 150 items to find
- Random order improves replayability
- Steam achievements
- Save and Load functionality
- A Leaderboard to immortalize your name
